description: Featuring ultra-fast transfer rates, massive storage capacities and an attractive aluminum housing, theU32 Shadow™is an ideal portable storage device. With an ultra-compact size, it fits easily into your   pocket for maximum portability. The stylish  design features a unique   aluminum body engineered to effectively dissipate heat and provide   durable portability.    The U32 Shadow provides exceptional speed results when connected to  a USB 3.0 port —up to  5 times faster than USB 2.0.Powered by the included USB 3.0 cable, the U32 Shadow requires no external AC  adapter or drivers - making it a simple  portable storage solution.  The drive includes a high-quality, padded carrying pouch and  flexible backup software that can be installed and configured if desired. Also included is10GB of lifetime cloud storagewith SpiderOak, which allows you to access your files from any smartphone, tablet or computer!
title: U32 Shadow™ 500GB External USB 3.0 Portable Hard Drive
